Utility.name: Utility Silverfish Stones
Utility.description:
Gives Silverfish Stones a Black and Yellow outline to make them stand out.

inspirationvt

incompat{Suspicious Silverfish Stones}

Utility.name: Translucent Pumpkin Overlay
Utility.description:
Changes visibility of the Pumpkin Overlay to be slightly translucent.

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Invisible Pumpkin Overlay
Utility.description:
Changes visibility of the Pumpkin Overlay to be completely invisible.

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Invisible Underwater Overlay
Utility.description: Changes visibility of the Underwater Overlay to be completely invisible. Makes for a way clearer diving experience.

Utility.name: Directional Hoppers
Utility.description:
Gives Hoppers some markings on the side when their facing into a block. Also fixes the underside of Hoppers to not look so god-awful.
The directonal markings also apply to Grated Hoppers from [Hopper Ducts](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/hopper-ducts) and the underside fix also works for [Round Robin Hopper](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/round-robin-hopper).

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Directional Dispensers/Droppers
Utility.description:
Gives Dispensers and Droppers some markings on the side when they're facing into a block. Also applies a fitting bottom texture to Dispensers and Droppers and lets them keep their side textures when facing up or down.

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Directional Observers
Utility.description:
Gives Observers some markings on the side when they're facing into a block. Also applies a little blob of Redstone to the top texture so that the player can see when the Observer is firing.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Visual Cauldron Fill Level
Utility.description:
Gives Cauldrons windows on the side that display the fill level. Also applies these windows to Et Futurum Requiem's Potion Cauldron.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Visual Composter Fill Level
Utility.description:
Gives Composters windows on the side that display the fill level.

requiresefr

inspirationvt
